name: Tesla Tunes
tagline: Copy your iTunes library, automatically converting Apple Lossless to flac, to a destination for use with your Tesla Model S
body:
A little utility I made for personal use, but thought a few others may also find it useful.

I wanted to work on it as a sample project for trying out different implementations, but will try to keep that at the development playground level and not expose that stuff in any actual releases.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
